snippet.title: Special Delivery - Cursed Letters
snippet.description:
A first-person stealth horror game with a retro-looking aesthetic. The game focuses on creating a mix between outlast and silent hill, filled with a feeling of dread around every corner while packing unique visuals, enemies, and mechanics that work together to create a unique and immersive recreation of a slasher movie turned into a game.

Wishlist it now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1335270/Cursed_Letters/

Join our Discord for more : https://discord.gg/QNrVmB2
